meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: [과연 모두가 원하는 소원 쓰기에 성공할 수 있을까?] [Can they succeed in making a wish that everyone wants?] View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.22
vlive.english: [Can they succeed in making a wish that everyone wants?]

vlive.english: Why is it so hard to write 3?

vlive.korean: 이게 막 빙의해서 쓰기가... It felt cringe-worthy and I got goosebumps. 듣기 View video BTS : 남준이의 7 비하인드 😂
vlive.english: It felt cringe-worthy and I got goosebumps.

vlive.english: What should we do? - Writing a name with butt?

vlive.korean: 큰 게 더 쓰기 힘들지 - 그래? It's harder to use ones that are bigger. - Really? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX 화이트데이
vlive.english: It's harder to use ones that are bigger. - Really?

examples.korean: a nifty little gadget for slicing cucumbers 발음듣기 오이 자를 때 쓰기 좋은 작은 기구 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: She began writing poetry in her teens. 발음듣기 그녀는 십대 때 시를 쓰기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She began writing poetry in her teens. 발음

examples.korean: He started writing music as early as 1989. 발음듣기 그는 일찍이 1989년에 곡을 쓰기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
